comment: She was pretty nice letting exams be open note.
She was fine. I had personal issues with her. But overall was a good professor.
Attending class, and submitting assignments on time will give you good credit.
One of the good ones in the MSCS program.

Dr. Lee helps prepare you for the exams with study guides that accurately match the test, and attending class is plenty for an A. She has accessible office hours if you have questions about any of the material, or want some extra test help. Recommended.

She has weekly participation grades, some labs and hw assignments, and two exams. The labs and hw assignments really help prepare you for the tests along with the lectures. You have one project that you can pick the topic for, and she's a very fair grader and a really nice person.
Great teacher, as long as you put the effort in, you should be able to make an A in this class. Make use of office hours if you have any questions and she will help you understand the material.

Great professor, hard to understand sometimes, but that's about it. If you have any trouble she will help you during her office hours or through an email. Her study guides are very helpful so you know what material you need to learn for a test. She also grades fairly so if you put the effort in, you will get an A in her class.
